document_data.mainbody:
Chantra was a sales clerk who worked at Elhazirs Exotica in Arabel in 1368 DR.
Chantra wore clothing to make her appear as a regular citizen and not the skilled wizard that she actually was.
In addition to accommodating paying customers, Chantra was adept at spying thieves who entered the store. In the event that she failed to identify one of these miscreants before they made a grab for the stores property, Chantra always had the use of her time stop spell to correct any issues with theft.
Chantra was one of six daughters of the stores owner, Elhazir.
Chantra wore an amulet that shielded her mind from magical and psionic intrusions.
